verbose_text: The ex vivo CA1 spiking activity was dependent on IL-1RI -/- and the observation that IL-1beta had an irreversible, detrimental effect on CA1 cells from ME7 animals also suggests a role for hippocampal IL-1beta in systemic inflammation induced neuronal death.
evidence: CA1 spiking activity was dependent on IL-1RI -/-  and the observation that IL-1beta had an irreversible, detrimental effect on CA1 cells from ME7 animals also suggests a role for hippocampal IL-1beta in systemic inflammation-induced neuronal death
